entries.journal_entry_description: Speak with Professor Zanier Hudmasse about an Old Republic droideka that was being studied at Stonewall Labs near Dee'ja Peak. That droideka housed an experimental Old Republic droid module, a Strategy/Tactics Simulation Chip.
entries.journal_entry_title: Old Republic Droid Modules: The Droideka
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Droid Module 3: Speak with Professor Zanier Hudmasse in Dee'ja Peak. Professor Hudmasse was Head of Research at Stonewall Labs, which is where the Old Republic droideka with the Strategy/Tactics Simulation Chip is reported to be.  You will need his help to get that module from the droideka.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Droid Module 3: Obtain Professor Hudmasse's Help
